channel.title: New/Updated flake8 Plugins
channel.description: Daily feed of new/updated flake8 plugins

item.title: Updated: flake8-quotes (3.4)
item.description: Flake8 lint for quotes.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-pydocstyle (0.2.4)
item.description: flake8 plugin that integrates pydocstyle
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: types-flake8-bugbear (24.2.6.20240209)
item.description: Typing stubs for flake8-bugbear
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-todos (0.3.1)
item.description: Python linter to check TODO comments for consistency and best practice.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bugbear (24.2.6)
item.description: A plugin for flake8 finding likely bugs and design problems in your program. Contains warnings that don't belong in pyflakes and pycodestyle.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-requirements (2.0.2)
item.description: Package requirements checker, plugin for flake8
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-bas (1)
item.description: Flake8 extension that checks for blank lines around (compound) statements.
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-logger (0.0.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin to warn the wrong arguments for log.*
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: New: flake8-sortcmp (0.0.0.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin to warn sort(cmp=)

item.title: New: flake8-iteritems (0.0.0.1)
item.description: flake8 plugin to warn dict.iteritems()

item.description: A flake8 plugin for managing type-checking imports & forward references
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.description: A Flake8 plugin that checks for issues using the standard library logging module.

item.description: Flake8 plugin for enforcing type annotations.

item.title: New: flake8-enforce-kwargs (0.1.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin for enforcing kwargs only argument definition.

item.title: New: flake8-restrict-imports (0.1.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin for restricting unwanted imports in a module.

item.title: New: flake8-self-documenting-f-strings (0.1.2)
item.description: flake8 plugin to run pycodecheck but ignore their incorrect self-documenting f-string errors in Python 3.12
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: flake8-picky-parentheses (0.5.4)
item.description: flake8 plugin to nitpick about parenthesis, brackets, and braces

item.title: Updated: flake8-secure-coding-standard (1.4.1)
item.description: Flake8 plugin adding some checks to make Python code adhere to more secure coding standard
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.description: Flake8 noqa comment validation
item.author: brian.skinn@gmail.com (Brian Skinn)

item.title: Updated: ignore-flake8-error (0.2.1)
item.description: add `noqa` comments to ignore every occurrence of a flake8 error
